desc: InSight’s marketing department is seeking a creative individual to produce a series of short videos for promotional and internal company release. This project-based contracting position will work closely with InSight’s marketing and communications team and will be granted access to InSight’s multi-media files including logos, large cannon of existing video footage and high quality photography. Final products must be delivered as Final Cut Pro projects and in .mov, and .mp4 formats.Videos must be approved by InSight’s marketing team before being marked complete. Most videos will be provider video introductions created from collaboration between the videographer and InSight’s remote providers who live throughout the United States. Because seeking therapy, counseling or psychiatry services is a big decision and people want to feel comfortable with the provider that they choose. A video introduction is a great way for a person to learn about the personality and approach of the providers from which that they are choosing. This is especially true in the case of online therapy and psychiatry appointments, like those offered on Inpathy.The InSight marketing team is looking for a personable, patient and experienced videographer who will help our providers produce strong video introductions. This is a flexible position perfect for someone with great communication skills and a flare for creativity.In gist, we are looking for more professional and uniform versions of what we already have, which can be viewed here: [url removed, login to view]
title: Produce Video Introductions Remotely

desc: My business partner and myself will be launching a new beverage into the market this summer. Launch date will preferably commence on the 31st of September and we are aiming to start building content by mid-August in order for us to be ready to launch by the end of September.To give you a little bit of an insight on what sort of beverage - it is a scientifically enhanced coconut water energy drink. Full of 4 electrolytes and as much potassium as one banana. We have prepared all necessary works and collateral to enable us to move forward that includes marketing and advertising collateral also.The reason why I am in need of a photographer is because we need content ready and prepared before we physically launch the beverage into the market. We would like to capture as many images which involves a lot of fitness and challenging activities. We would like to capture images as similar as possible as the images attached. Plus more. We will be more than happy to scout models but if you feel you have models prepared and ready to shoot straight away and you feel more comfortable with them taking into consideration they suit the aesthetic of the brand and style of photos it would be better also.As I mentioned above - it is a start-up, we've been investing in the beverage itself and at the moment have minimal budget for our marketing activities. It would help us move forward and begin delivering a uniquely amazing product into the market if we could have your support and help in return we would love to promote you and your work and collectively work together.
